description: Detects execution of "AdPlus.exe", a binary that is part of the Windows SDK that can be used as a LOLBIN in order to dump process memory and execute arbitrary commands.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate usage of Adplus for debugging purposes
name: Potential Adplus.EXE Abuse
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\adplus.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Adplus.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \-hang\ *" OR "*\ \-pn\ *" OR "*\ \-pmn\ *" OR "*\ \-p\ *" OR "*\ \-po\ *" OR "*\ \-c\ *" OR "*\ \-sc\ *"))
